trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies the token issued as a service credential.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenServiceElement"></xref> class.
Gets a collection of audience URIs that are allowed in the element.
For more information on this property, see [\<allowedAudienceUris\>](../Topic/%3CallowedAudienceUris%3E.md)
A collection of audience URIs that are allowed in the element.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether untrusted RSA certificate issuers are allowed.
Certificates are signed by certification authorities (CAs) to verify authenticity.
An untrusted issuer is a CA that is not specified to be trusted to sign certificates.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if untrusted RSA certificate issuers are accepted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> should be validated.

A valid value of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode"></xref> that specifies whether the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> should be validated.
Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
A valid value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>.

If set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>, then a <xref uid="langword_csharp_customCertificateValidator" name="customCertificateValidator" href=""></xref> must also be supplied.
The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>.
Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenServiceElement"></xref>.
A configuration element to copy from.
from is or empty.
The configuration file is read-only.
Gets or sets the type and assembly used to validate a custom type.
The type and assembly used to validate a custom type.
Gets a collection of configuration elements that specify certificates issued by a trusted issuer.
A collection of configuration elements that specify certificates issued by a trusted issuer.
To be added.
Gets or sets the revocation mode that specifies whether a revocation check occurs, and if it is performed online or offline.
The revocation mode.
Gets or sets the type of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is used for the service credential.
The type of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is used for the service credential.
Gets or sets the location of the X.509 certificate store.
A valid value of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref>.
